Key: It's morning...

(I feel like I haven't slept much. Maybe it's because
I was deep in thought before I went to bed.)
What should I do...?

(I recalled the events of last night. Not only were
Rinne and Maria back. But Marina also existed in this
world. She should have completely disappeared...)
And that girl... Rio. Rio Sonogami... did she claim to be?

(The girl who called me Papa. Thinking back, she
seemed to act so similar. Like... the Ruler... and
Rinne, who used to rule over Eden.)

Maybe she knows something. I want to see her again
if it's possible, but...

(I have no idea where she is, so there's no way for
me to contact her. Marina seemed to know something,
but she can't access the Fraxinus from here.)
Hmm, what should I do...?
Wake up, Shido! It's time for breakfast!
T-Tohka? I'm already up, but... why are you in a rush?

Shido, hurry up and come downstairs! I can't wait any
longer!
O-Okay. I'll be right down...
What's going on?
Oh. Morning, Shido. Look at this.
Huh...? What happened...

(Kotori pointed toward the table. There were various
dishes made of Western, Chinese, and Japanese food.
This was way too much for breakfast.)
It... looks like there's enough for ten of us...

S-Sorry Shido... I was answering everyone's requests,
and it just kept getting larger and larger. I used the
leftovers from yesterday.

I was helping her at first, but then it was getting
really fun... I wasn't careful.

It's fine. Maria-chan, you don't have to apologize.
You just helped me. I'm the one at fault...

Stop it, you two. I think I get the gist of it. So you
used everything from yesterday?

Yes. There were also ingredients we were going to
use for today, and we thought it'd be a waste to
throw it all away.

So I guess we had more than we thought... I'm
surprised.

(I didn't think we had much left, yet they made all
this. I'm scared to ask how much we consumed
yesterday... I'm not even going to think about it.)

I was surprised too! A full-course meal at the start
of the day is like a dream come true!
...But we can't just eat all of this so easily.

It's fine. I had a feeling this would happen, so I
already called for backup. I'm sure they'll be here
any minute now.
...Oh, Kotori, it's you.
How rude. Did you forget your adorable sister's face?

That's not what I'm saying. I mean, I knew you were
here, but you weren't your other version yesterday,
were you?

Oh... Is that what you're talking about? Excuse me for
being the annoying one today.

That's not what I said. Both of them are just two
sides of my cute little sister.
Y-You always say that...
Oh, seems like they're here.
Um... Shido-san. Good morning.
Ya-hooo, Shido-kuuuun. We came to help.

I have accepted your invite, dear Shido. Now, where
is the feast that shall satisfy my stomach?

Entering. Good morning, Shido. Thank you for inviting
us.

Good morning～ Wow, to eat breakfast with darling
and all these adorable girls... That's so awesome!

Morning, everyone. It sure is livelier with all of you
here.

Hehe... I know. Thank you, everyone. You're really
helping us a lot.

I would like to thank you all as well. I guarantee that
you will be satisfied, so please help yourselves.

All right. We don't have much time, so let's get to
eating.
Yeah! Thank you!
Hahaha... Tohka-chan is so fast...

You listen to me... All-you-can-eat! That means we
can get more than seconds!

Tohka. I thought your plate was just full. Maybe you
should chew more before you swallow.
Hm? I am chewing, though.
Oh, are you? Well, as long as you are...
Seriously... There's so much.
There's toast, rice, Chinese porridge. Wow, so much!
Hehehe. Scrumptious. I say this dinner suits me.
Correction. Dinners are evening meals.
*Grunt*?! I-I am not normal. I transcend time!

I see. You're amazing, Kaguya-san! Then that means
you can probably eat more～
...Excuse me? Miku, why do you say that?

Because of what you said, Kaguya-san. If you're able
to transcend time, then that means you're able to
manipulate digestion time～

Oh, um... Well... There are limits to the exact
amount.

Demonstration. Luckily, there are lots of dishes here
to test that theory. Miku, let's help her together.

Okaaaay. *Giggle*... Kaguya-san, that kind of face
looks cute on you.
NOOOOOOO!

Oh, this is the one you made, right Maria-chan? It's
similar-tasting to Shido's. It tastes kind. I like it.

Thank you, Rinne. Not only did I copy Shido, I also
wanted my personality to stand out, so I've been
practicing secretly.

You sure are a hard worker, Maria-chan. I never
thought about it like that. I just want everyone to
smile and say it's delicious.
Rinne, this is unfair.
It's... unfair? Um... Why?

I won't tell you why. Rinne, you should learn to
analyze yourself more.
Um... Okay, got it.
Shido, what's the matter? You aren't eating much.

Oh, I was just thinking about how lively it is.
Anyways, I'm going to dig in!
I feel pain in my stomach...

(Since Tohka was near me, every time my plate was
empty, she put new food on it for me. Before I knew
it, both my stomach and the plate were full.)
You don't have to eat it all, you know?
But I can't do that...

(I refused any more food after that, but I did manage
to clear the plate in front of me.)

But I'm so surprised that we were able to finish
everything...
Yeah, that was unexpected.
(Well, we can say Tohka ate most of it.)

(During recess, Tohka and the girls gathered around
Maria's desk. They were talking about breakfast. We
ended up rushing and barely made it to homeroom.)

Wow, I didn't realize so much happened this morning.
I would have liked to join in.

I'm sorry for not inviting you. I figured it might be
difficult for you and Origami to come over so early in
the morning.
Don't worry about it. I don't blame you.

Unfortunate. If you had called me, I would have been
over in a flash. Next time, I would like it if you invited
me.

Okay, I will be sure to do so. Oh, come to think of it,
I don't know if I have your contact information,
Origami. Would you mind letting me know?
Got it. I will send it to you later.

Huh? Send...? Tobiichi-san. How do you know Maria-
chan's number?
Industry secret.

I-I see... I'm going to not think about it, okay?
Ahaha...

(Origami is her usual self. Her ability to gather
information is just amazing. I want to ask her one day
how she does it.)

Man, it sure was intense. Both Rinne and Maria's
dishes were amazing. I couldn't stop eating.

We made a mistake, so thanks for helping us out.
But I'm glad you guys were happy.

Well, Tohka Yatogami, you should practice more
self-control. You think a girl who eats a lot will be
liked by guys. Shido is secretly turned off by it.

Wh-What did you say, Origami Tobiichi?! Shido didn't
say that!

That's right, Tobiichi-san. Shido would like it if
someone ate his cooking with a smile. Just like me.
Right?
Oh, I see! Right! Heh, that's right, Origami Tobiichi.

You sure got me good... Rinne Sonogami, I shouldn't
let you be. An advantage that a childhood friend has
in living next door is detrimental to my approach.

My, my... Origami-san? You should repent for always
putting the others down.
You're one to talk.
Hehe... You sure have a mouth, don't you?

Calm down, you two. Next time, why don't we do a
hotcake party? We can do it after school as an
afternoon snack.

My, that sure sounds like a great idea. Right,
Origami-san?

I'm going to join, too. That kind of event should be
fair.

I agree. I mean, Rinne-san and Maria-san, aside from
Kotori-san, you two are the closest to Shido-san.

(I was smiling while watching them talk, and Kurumi
looked toward me. I looked away so our eyes wouldn't
meet.)
Yeah, but we can't help it... Right, Maria-chan?
Yes, there's no point in even pointing it out.
(Rinne and Maria were even looking at me.)
All right, next time we'll do pancakes! I can't wait!

Yes, I look forward to it as well. Let's do it sometime
next week.

Oh, I think the bell is about to ring. We need to get
back to our seats.
Roger.
We'll see you guys later.

(Everyone is centered around Maria. I wonder how
much longer I can witness this. Thinking of it made my
heart ache.)
*Yawn*... Today's classes are finally over.
Shido, you have a moment?
Hm? Maria? What is it?

Rinne and I decided to drop by somewhere after
school. So when you get home, we won't be there.
Oh, you two together...? Got it. Have fun, okay?
Okay. I'm going to have Rinne teach me some things.

Okay. Then I'm going to go walk around. You be
careful, Maria.
Okay. We can't be for sure. You be careful too, Shido.
Got it. Later.
(All right. I'll go kill some time.)
